ClaimToken(Account, String, String, String, String, Int64, OptionalTransactionArgs)

Claims a token on specified account.

Declaration
public Task<PendingTransactionPayload> ClaimToken(Account account, string sender, string creator, string collectionName, string name, long propertyVersion = 0L, OptionalTransactionArgs extraArgs = null)
Parameters
Type Name Description
Account account

Account which will claim token.
System.String sender

Hex-encoded 32 byte Aptos account address which holds a token.
System.String creator

Hex-encoded 32 byte Aptos account address which created a token.
System.String collectionName

Name of collection where token is stored.
System.String name

Token name.
System.Int64 propertyVersion

The version of token PropertyMap with a default value 0.
OptionalTransactionArgs extraArgs

Extra args for checking the balance.
Returns
Type Description
System.Threading.Tasks.Task<PendingTransactionPayload>

The transaction submitted to the API.

Type Name Description

System.String name

Token name.
System.String description

Token description.
System.UInt64 supply

Token supply.
System.String uri

URL to additional info about token.
System.UInt64 max

The maxium of tokens can be minted from this token.
System.String royaltyPayeeAddress

The address to receive the royalty, the address can be a shared account address.
System.Int32 royaltyPointsDenominator

The denominator for calculating royalty.
System.Int32 royaltyPointsNumerator

The numerator for calculating royalty.
System.String[] propertyKeys

The property keys for storing on-chain properties.
System.String[] propertyValues

The property values to be stored on-chain.
System.String[] propertyTypes

The type of property values.

Extra args for checking the balance.

OfferToken(Account, String, String, String, String, Int64, Int64, OptionalTransactionArgs)

Transfers specified amount of tokens from account to receiver.

Declaration
public Task<PendingTransactionPayload> OfferToken(Account account, string receiver, string creator, string collectionName, string name, long amount, long propertyVersion = 0L, OptionalTransactionArgs extraArgs = null)
Parameters
Type Name Description
Account account

Account where token from which tokens will be transfered.
System.String receiver

Hex-encoded 32 byte Aptos account address to which tokens will be transfered.
System.String creator

Hex-encoded 32 byte Aptos account address to which created tokens.
System.String collectionName

Name of collection where token is stored.
System.String name

Token name.
System.Int64 amount

Amount of tokens which will be transfered.
System.Int64 propertyVersion

The version of token PropertyMap with a default value 0.
OptionalTransactionArgs extraArgs

Extra args for checking the balance.
Returns
Type Description
System.Threading.Tasks.Task<PendingTransactionPayload>

The transaction submitted to the API.
